mapper.select:
SELECT CRE_SEQ ,DATE_FORMAT(STRT_SCHD_YMD,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS STRT_SCHD_YMD ,DATE_FORMAT(END_SCHD_YMD,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS END_SCHD_YMD ,TIT ,CONT ,DATE_FORMAT(CRE_DAT,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS CRE_DAT FROM SCHD_BAS WHERE CONVERT(#{SEARCH_DATE},DATETIME) BETWEEN STRT_SCHD_YMD AND END_SCHD_YMD AND MEMB_SC_CD = #{MEMB_SC_CD}
AND MEMB_DEP_CD = #{MEMB_DEP_CD}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER() AS R_NUM ,Z.MEMB_ID ,Z.CRE_SEQ ,Z.VOT_TITLE ,Z.VOT_TYPE_CD ,DATE_FORMAT(Z.VOT_EXPR_DATE,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS VOT_EXPR_DATE ,Z.VOT_DESC
,CASE WHEN DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(),'%Y-%m-%i') > Z.VOT_EXPR_DATE THEN 'VF' WHEN DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(),'%Y-%m-%i') <= Z.VOT_EXPR_DATE THEN 'VG' ELSE 'VE' END AS VOT_GO_CD
,B.SCH_NM AS MEMB_SC_NM ,B.DPRT_NM AS MEMB_DEP_NM ,D.CODE_VAL AS TIT_NM ,A.NICK_NM ,GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT IFNULL(E.VOT_SEQ, '0') ORDER BY E.VOT_SEQ ASC SEPARATOR ',') AS VOT_SEL_SEQ ,GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT CONCAT(F.VOT_SEQ,':',F.VOT_DESC) ORDER BY F.VOT_SEQ ASC SEPARATOR ',') AS VOT_INFO FROM VOT_BAS Z LEFT JOIN VOT_STAT E ON E.CRE_SEQ = Z.CRE_SEQ AND E.MEMB_ID = #{LOGIN_ID} LEFT JOIN VOT_DTL F ON F.CRE_SEQ = Z.CRE_SEQ LEFT JOIN MEMB_BAS A ON A.MEMB_ID = Z.MEMB_ID AND Z.MEMB_SC_CD = #{MEMB_SC_CD} AND Z.MEMB_DEP_CD = #{MEMB_DEP_CD} LEFT JOIN SCHL_DPRT_SRCH B ON B.SCH_CD = A.MEMB_SC_CD AND B.DPRT_CD = A.MEMB_DEP_CD LEFT JOIN CD_BAS D ON D.CODE_TYPE = 'TIT_CD' AND D.CODE = A.TIT_CD GROUP BY Z.CRE_SEQ ORDER BY Z.VOT_EXPR_DATE DESC ) A
WHERE A.R_NUM >= (IF(1 = #{REQ_PAGE},0,#{REQ_PAGE}-1) * IF(1 = #{REQ_PAGE},0,#{LIST_UNIT_CNT})) + 1 AND A.R_NUM <= #{REQ_PAGE} * #{LIST_UNIT_CNT}

insert.foreach: INSERT INTO VOT_DTL(CRE_SEQ, VOT_SEQ, VOT_DESC) VALUES (#{CRE_SEQ}, #{index}+1, #{item})
INSERT INTO VOT_STAT(CRE_SEQ, VOT_SEQ, MEMB_ID) VALUES (#{CRE_SEQ}, CAST(#{item} AS UNSIGND), #{MEMB_ID})

mapper.select: SELECT A.VOT_TOT ,B.VOT_SEQ ,B.VOT_SUB_TOT ,ROUND(B.VOT_SUB_TOT / A.VOT_TOT * 100) AS PRCT FROM (SELECT COUNT(*) AS VOT_TOT FROM VOT_STAT WHERE CRE_SEQ = #{CRE_SEQ}) A ,(SELECT VOT_SEQ, COUNT(*) VOT_SUB_TOT FROM VOT_STAT WHERE CRE_SEQ = #{CRE_SEQ} GROUP BY CRE_SEQ,VOT_SEQ) B
